ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥åŒæ—¶æŒ‡å®šå¤šä¸ªå€¼ï¼Œç”¨é€—å·åˆ†éš”ï¼Œåƒè¿™æ ·ï¼šTransfer-Encoding: gzip, chunkedã€‚

å…¶ä¸­ï¼Œchunked å°±æ¯”è¾ƒæœ‰æ„æ€äº†ã€‚å®ƒè¡¨ç¤ºæœåŠ¡å™¨ä¸‹å‘åˆ°å®¢æˆ·ç«¯çš„å†…å®¹ä¸æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¡æ€§å®Œæˆçš„ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯åˆ†æˆä¸€å°å—ä¸€å°å—ï¼ˆtrunkï¼‰ä¸‹å‘ï¼Œè¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ä¸æœåŠ¡å™¨çš„è¿æ¥ä»ç„¶ç»´æŒä¸ä¼šæ–­å¼€ã€‚

åœ¨ Web Socket æ²¡å‡ºæ¥å‰ï¼Œå¯åˆ©ç”¨è¿™ä¸€æœºåˆ¶å®ç°é•¿è¿æ¥çš„æ•ˆæœã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹

ä»¥ Node.js ä¸ºä¾‹çš„ Transfer-Encoding: gzip, chunked ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š

var http = require("http");

function generateChunk(index, response) {
  setTimeout(() => {
    if (index === 5) {
      response.write("end");
      response.end("</body></html>");
    } else {
      response.write(`<p> chunk ${index}</p>`);
    }
  }, index * 1000);
}

function handlerRequest(_request, response) {
  response.setHeader("Content-Type", "text/html; charset=UTF-8");
  response.setHeader("Transfer-Encoding", "chunked");
  response.write(`<!DOCTYPE html>
  <html lang="en">
  <head>
  <meta charset="utf-8">
  <title>HTTP åˆ†å—ä¼ è¾“ç¤ºä¾‹</title>
  </head>
  <body>
  <h1>HTTP åˆ†å—ä¼ è¾“ç¤ºä¾‹</h1>
  `);

  let index = 0;
  while (index <= 5) {
    generateChunk(index, response);
    index++;
  }
}

const server = http.createServer(handlerRequest);
server.listen(3000);
console.log("server started at http://localhost:3000");

Transfer-Encoding:chunked åˆ†å—ä¼ è¾“ç¤ºä¾‹
